svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 9 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 9, 2023" date: "2023-12-09"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Devnet-12: issues being found & fixed; Prysm expect to join in 1-2 weeks Goerli ~300
node shadow fork planned before end of December Goerli upgrade to be scheduled in January to test 3/6
(target/max) blobs Community can propose EIPs for next upgrade , to be discussed in January
Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Devnet-12: issues being found & fixed; Prysm expect to join in 1-2 weeks
Devnet-12: issues being found & fixed; Prysm expect to join in 1-2 weeks
‚Ä¢ Goerli ~300 node shadow fork planned before end of December
Goerli ~300 node shadow fork planned before end of December
‚Ä¢ Goerli upgrade to be scheduled in January to test 3/6 (target/max) blobs
Goerli upgrade to be scheduled in January to test 3/6 (target/max) blobs
‚Ä¢ Community can propose EIPs for next upgrade , to be discussed in January
Community can propose EIPs for next upgrade , to be discussed in January
‚Ä¢ Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.5 : clarifies when clients can serve blocks & sidecars byRoot
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.5 : clarifies when clients can serve blocks & sidecars byRoot
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 32.03% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 32.03% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Reth (node) crawler : ~19k active nodes found using UDP & inbound TCP
Reth (node) crawler : ~19k active nodes found using UDP & inbound TCP
‚Ä¢ Erigon 2024 roadmap: Erigon++ (evmone, SilkRPC C++ components), Caplin full archive node, Erigon v3
& Otterscan (enhanced with Erigon v3 & Beacon Chain capability via Caplin)
Erigon 2024 roadmap: Erigon++ (evmone, SilkRPC C++ components), Caplin full archive node, Erigon v3 &
Otterscan (enhanced with Erigon v3 & Beacon Chain capability via Caplin)
‚Ä¢ Lightclients: EIP3074 (AUTH & AUTHCALL opcodes) would allow EOAs to be used within ERC4337 (Account
Abstraction using alt transaction pool)
Lightclients: EIP3074 (AUTH & AUTHCALL opcodes) would allow EOAs to be used within ERC4337 (Account
For Stakers
‚Ä¢ Rescue Node adds support for solo stakers, fallback node for temporary access in
emergencies/maintenance
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Erigon v2.55.1 : patch Nethermind v1.23.0 : OP Stack support (Canyon upgrade not
yet supported), initialize DB using snapshot and reduced memory consumption when overloaded with CL
requests Reth v0.1.0-alpha.13 : fix block commit times for full node & heavy RPC tracing users
‚Ä¢ Erigon v2.55.1 : patch
Erigon v2.55.1 : patch
‚Ä¢ Nethermind v1.23.0 : OP Stack support (Canyon upgrade not yet supported), initialize DB using
snapshot and reduced memory consumption when overloaded with CL requests
Nethermind v1.23.0 : OP Stack support (Canyon upgrade not yet supported), initialize DB using snapshot
and reduced memory consumption when overloaded with CL requests
‚Ä¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.13 : fix block commit times for full node & heavy RPC tracing users
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.13 : fix block commit times for full node & heavy RPC tracing users
Research
‚Ä¢ Timing games : implications of proposers delaying block publication to increase MEV and pros & cons
of possible mitigations
Timing games : implications of proposers delaying block publication to increase MEV and pros & cons of
possible mitigations
‚Ä¢ CEX<>DEX arbitrage empirical analysis
CEX<>DEX arbitrage empirical analysis
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ L2BEAT liveness dashboard adds intervals of proof submissions for zk rollups
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7570 : Security token interface for confidentiality & legal status
transparency ERC7571 : Shadow events ERC7572 : Contract-level metadata via contractURI
‚Ä¢ ERC7570 : Security token interface for confidentiality & legal status transparency
ERC7570 : Security token interface for confidentiality & legal status transparency
‚Ä¢ ERC7571 : Shadow events
ERC7571 : Shadow events
‚Ä¢ ERC7572 : Contract-level metadata via contractURI
ERC7572 : Contract-level metadata via contractURI
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Solidity developer survey 2023 : feedback to the Solidity team
Solidity developer survey 2023 : feedback to the Solidity team
‚Ä¢ Shadow logs: add custom events for contracts to offchain shadow fork, access via RPC
Shadow logs: add custom events for contracts to offchain shadow fork, access via RPC
‚Ä¢ Foundry Go differential fuzzing template to compare Solidity & Go implementations
Foundry Go differential fuzzing template to compare Solidity & Go implementations
‚Ä¢ Wagmi-permit : sign ERC2612/DAI permits with viem/wagmi
Wagmi-permit : sign ERC2612/DAI permits with viem/wagmi
‚Ä¢ Guide to web3.py typed data message signing
Guide to web3.py typed data message signing
‚Ä¢ EF Python team: Ethereum Python user survey
EF Python team: Ethereum Python user survey
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin access manager explorer for contract permissions
OpenZeppelin access manager explorer for contract permissions
‚Ä¢ Protolambda‚Äôs Grug wallet design
Protolambda‚Äôs Grug wallet design
Security
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin : contracts integrating both Multicall & ERC2771 vulnerable to address spoofing
Thirdweb vulnerability , impacted pre-built contract deployers need to mitigate
‚Ä¢ Thirdweb vulnerability , impacted pre-built contract deployers need to mitigate
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ Blocknative Ethernow transaction explorer (including live transaction pool), desktop only
Blocknative Ethernow transaction explorer (including live transaction pool), desktop only
‚Ä¢ Parsec block explorer, supports mainnet & L2s, transaction heat map and custom layouts for address
types
Parsec block explorer, supports mainnet & L2s, transaction heat map and custom layouts for address
‚Ä¢ MEV searching strategy: blind arbs on private orderflow
MEV searching strategy: blind arbs on private orderflow
‚Ä¢ EF run a node grantees : 35 recipients from 23 countries
EF run a node grantees : 35 recipients from 23 countries
‚Ä¢ Optimism‚Äôs RetroPGF3 voting ended , 502 projects qualified for share of 30M OP
Optimism‚Äôs RetroPGF3 voting ended , 502 projects qualified for share of 30M OP
Enterprise
‚Ä¢ Societe Generale issued EUR 10M green bond onchain
Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 21.4 to 144.2 gwei, with 45.2 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 21.8 gwei 17.6k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 21.4 to 144.2 gwei, with 45.2 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
‚Ä¢ 17.6k ETH net burn this week
17.6k ETH net burn this week
‚Ä¢ ETHUSD : $2,086 - $2,385, currently $2,361
ETHUSD : $2,086 - $2,385, currently $2,361
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ Safe RecoveryHub : set multisig recoverer(s), recovery attempt can be canceled within review window
Safe RecoveryHub : set multisig recoverer(s), recovery attempt can be canceled within review window
‚Ä¢ Coinbase Wallet links : send USDC via a shareable link, returned if not claimed within 2 weeks
Coinbase Wallet links : send USDC via a shareable link, returned if not claimed within 2 weeks
‚Ä¢ Matcha cross chain swaps live on mainnet, L2s & sidechains
Matcha cross chain swaps live on mainnet, L2s & sidechains
‚Ä¢ Proof of P2P : soulbound NFT, zk proof of unique human with P2P account, requires Venmo
Proof of P2P : soulbound NFT, zk proof of unique human with P2P account, requires Venmo
‚Ä¢ Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è the Art (NFT creator contest) extended to January 8

Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
Enya Labs: Lead Security Engineer , Sr. Fullstack Dev (with Go exp), BizDev
‚Ä¢ Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
‚Ä¢ ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup
at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ Russian owner of Bitzlato exchange pleaded guilty to unlicensed money transmitting [back in January
US DoJ pre-announced enforcement action ]
Russian owner of Bitzlato exchange pleaded guilty to unlicensed money transmitting [back in January US
DoJ pre-announced enforcement action ]
‚Ä¢ Platypus hackers acquitted by Paris court, as deemed smart contract interaction
Platypus hackers acquitted by Paris court, as deemed smart contract interaction
General
‚Ä¢ Governments obtained push notification metadata from Apple (subpoena) & Google (court order)
Governments obtained push notification metadata from Apple (subpoena) & Google (court order)

Security self audit: Telegram and Google account

@evan_van_ness to get most of the week‚Äôs news in real time.
